title: Potential Polygamist
itunes:title: Potential Polygamist
description:
Good morning everybody. I love this radio station and I've listened to you guys every morning. OK here's my story. I'm a 28 year old black female I'm a wife of six years and a mother of two lovely girls. I love my husband and my family and I truly know that he is my best friend. Well here goes, my husband is nine years my senior. That's not the problem because I love older men.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
